lld_hsi2c_initParam_s Struct Reference
HS I2C Driver API

lld_hsi2c_initParam_s contains the I2C initialisation parameters. This is passed as an argument to lld_i2c_init() API. see lld_hsi2c_opMode More...

#include <lld_hsi2c.h>

Data Fields

lld_hsi2c_opMode opMode

uint32_t i2cIntNum
 
void * edmaParam
 
lld_hsi2c_isr_handler i2cIsr
 

Detailed Description

lld_hsi2c_initParam_s contains the I2C initialisation parameters. This is passed as an argument to lld_i2c_init() API. see lld_hsi2c_opMode

Field Documentation

void* lld_hsi2c_initParam_s::edmaParam

EDMA parameters

lld_i2c_busspeed lld_hsi2c_initParam_s::i2cBusFreq

I2C Bus Frequency (in KHz)

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_initParam_s::i2cIntNum

Interrupt number

lld_hsi2c_isr_handler lld_hsi2c_initParam_s::i2cIsr

Interrupt handler

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_initParam_s::i2cOwnAddr

Own address (7 or 10 bits)

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_initParam_s::is10BitAddr

Addressing mode: 0: 7 bit addressing mode 1: 10 bit addressing mode

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_initParam_s::isMasterMode

Operating in Master/Slave mode: 0: Slave mode 1: Master mode 2: Slave Trans receive mode

lld_hsi2c_opMode lld_hsi2c_initParam_s::opMode

Driver operating mode - polled ,interrupt or DMA For valid values see lld_hsi2c_opMode
